text: Arteshbod Gholam-Ali Oveissi (; 16 April 1918 â€“ 7 February 1984) was an Iranian general and the Commander of the Imperial Iranian Army under Mohammad Reza Pahlavi. He was the last general to head the Imperial Army of Iran. He is regarded as one of the most powerful military generals in Iran's modern history. ==References== Category:Iranian generals Category:1918 births Category:1984 deaths Category:People murdered in Europe Category:Iranian politicians
title: Gholam Ali Oveissi
